author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HUMBERTO EXPECTED TO PRODUCE DANGEROUS SURF AND RIP CURRENTS FOR BERMUDA AND MOST OF THE U.S. EAST COAST THIS WEEK... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS POSSIBLE IN BERMUDA ON TUESDAY...
summary: ...HUMBERTO EXPECTED TO PRODUCE DANGEROUS SURF AND RIP CURRENTS FOR BERMUDA AND MOST OF THE U.S. EAST COAST THIS WEEK... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS POSSIBLE IN BERMUDA ON TUESDAY... As of 11:00 AM AST Mon Sep 29 the center of Humberto was located near 28.0, -67.6 with movement NW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 940 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 145 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...HUMBERTO EXPECTED TO PRODUCE DANGEROUS SURF AND RIP CURRENTS FOR BERMUDA AND MOST OF THE U.S. EAST COAST THIS WEEK... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS POSSIBLE IN BERMUDA ON TUESDAY... As of 11:00 AM AST Mon Sep 29 the center of Humberto was located near 28.0, -67.6 with movement NW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 940 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 145 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Humberto (AT3/AL082025)
